main.*:
The director, referred to as "'''the next next "Martin Scorsese"'''",  auditioned [[Joey Tribbiani|Joey]] in "[[The One With Ross And Monica's Cousin]]". He was portrayed by [[Scott Adsit]].

The director needs to see the male actors naked as there's full nudity in the film he's directing and the role calls for an uncircumcised man.  Joey claims he isn't circumcised and [[Monica Geller|Monica]] offers to make a skin-like cover but it drops off at the audition.
